definitions.definition: A robe , gown , or other article of clothing worn as an indication of office .
Any of the special articles of clothing worn by members of the clergy etc., especially a garment worn at the celebration of the Eucharist .
An article of clothing, especially an outer garment .

main_definition: A robe , gown , or other article of clothing worn as an indication of office .
secondary_definitions: Any of the special articles of clothing worn by members of the clergy etc., especially a garment worn at the celebration of the Eucharist .
( archaic ) An article of clothing, especially an outer garment .
